snippet: Through grief, a father finds a way to make a difference.
abstract: Francis X Clines Editorial Observer focuses on Mark Barden, whose 7-year-old son Daniel was among 26 victims killed in Newtown, Conn, school massacre; notes that Barden is channeling his grief into advocating for gun control laws.
lead_paragraph: Through grief, a father finds a way to make a difference.

headline.print_headline: A Sandy Hook Parent Finds His Voice in Moving Beyond ‘the Darkest Horror of It All’
